au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.action.notify
Class LinuxWriteNotifyAction

java.lang.Object
  au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.action.notify.LinuxWriteNotifyAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAction, INotifyAction
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public class LinuxWriteNotifyAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements INotifyAction

Notification action which provides an operating system notification using the 'write' (1) command. 'write' prints a message to a specific users terminal. The KDE desktop environment provides a write daemon that provides a desktop dialog for write written messages.
NOTE:The Linux write notification only runs on the Linux operating system. If run on other platforms, an IllegalStateException exception thrown on construction.
